scripts.postinstall: npm run install:js-framework && npm run install:h5-render
scripts.clean: npm run clean:examples && npm run clean:test
scripts.transform: npm run transform:examples && npm run transform:test
scripts.build: npm run build:js-framework && npm run build:h5-render && npm run build:copy2sdk
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run transform
scripts.dev-examples: npm run clean:examples && npm run transform:examples
scripts.serve: npm run dev && npm run build && serve ./ -p 12580
scripts.ci: npm run ci:js-framework && npm run ci:h5-render
scripts.precommit:
